channel.title: Hacked
channel.description: i think someone breaks in my account everyday since when i last logged out i had a full diamond tool set in my inventory and now a diamond pick and an iropn sword, can someone check the ip's please.

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

hmm yeah that’s possible, well then it’s solved and i did also delete my .bin to install modloader.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:398218”]I noticed when I upgraded to 1.6 that the old essentials had multiple save files for each person, like Moparisthebest.yml, moparisthebest.yml and such all with different case. I was forced to delete the duplicates so they didn’t conflict, maybe that had something to do with it?[/quote]Well maybe if you deleted the wrong one it could o.o

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I noticed when I upgraded to 1.6 that the old essentials had multiple save files for each person, like Moparisthebest.yml, moparisthebest.yml and such all with different case. I was forced to delete the duplicates so they didn’t conflict, maybe that had something to do with it?

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:11, topic:398218”]Thanks David but how did it happen then?
I had a full diamond tools set (w/o hoe) and it got replaced by an iron sword a diamond pick and a block of dirt.
And one time i just had an empty inventory and started at spawn even tho i logged in.[/quote]
I’ve deleted my .minecraft before and i logged on the moparcraft server and i spawned at the spawn with nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m not sure mate; maybe you were sleep-playing?

Read full topic

I had a full diamond tools set (w/o hoe) and it got replaced by an iron sword a diamond pick and a block of dirt.

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I checked the logs (which actually isn’t as easy as you’d think, it’s split into different files so you actually need to check a bunch of different ones) and you have only logged in from one IP in the last 72 hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

nvm i see your not interested in checking the logs for a low life form that’s me.
Sorry to annoy you sir.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The pass login plugin is freely available and open source, but that doesn’t mean it can be used to log in with another’s username.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:6, topic:398218”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=495351.msg3622252#msg3622252 date=1307537194]

Or here is an idea, change your password?
[/quote]my password takes 5 months to crack with a computer, i think he just used a hack client (like i code rsps)
but sure.

And did you check the logs?

A cracked client does no good when you need your moparscape forum password to login?[/quote]i code rsps got pass the login plugin and hacked davidi2 and other’s to so what’s your point?

Read full topic
